sql: ALTER TABLE xtify ADD COLUMN markUnread INT DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE xtify ADD COLUMN expiredDate VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '';
CREATE TABLE 'forms' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, filedTimestamp DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, type VARCHAR(10), flexFormId INTEGER, offline SMALLINT DEFAULT 1);
CREATE TABLE 'formsData' (formId INTEGER, questionId INTEGER, elementName TEXT, answer TEXT);
ALTER TABLE callerIdCache ADD COLUMN bitValue INT;
